title: FishPopulation
description: Tracking fish population counts, maturation, and incubation over time.

alternateName.description: An alternative name for this item

bodyMasse.description: The average body mass of cultured fishes

dataProvider.description: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

dateCreated.description: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

dateModified.description: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

initialNumber.description: Number of initial number of cultured fishes

owner.description: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

relatedSource.description: List of IDs the current entity may have in external applications

seeAlso.description: list of uri pointing to additional resources about the item

source.description: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

areaServed.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

scientificName.description: The scientific name of the fish species.

maturityDaysBegin.description: The range of days from birth for the fish population to become sexually mature.

maturityDaysEnd.description: The range of days from birth for the fish population to become sexually mature.

incubationDaysBegin.description: The range of days for egg incubation.

incubationDaysEnd.description: The range of days for egg incubation.

incubationNumberMin.description: The range of fish born after incubation.

incubationNumberMax.description: The range of fish born after incubation.

percentPopulationPregnantMin.description: The the percentage of the population that becomes pregnant at incubation time.

percentPopulationPregnantMax.description: The the percentage of the population that becomes pregnant at incubation time.

populationsAtBirth.description: A list of population counts at birth.

populationsNow.description: A list of population counts now, since birth.

incubationDate.description: The date and time that incubation started for this fish population.

incubationDaysNow.description: The current number of days of egg incubation.

waterTemperature.description: The water temperature can affect fish population survival.

waterSalinity.description: The water salinity can affect fish population survival.

waterOxygen.description: The water oxygen levels can affect fish population survival.

waterPh.description: The water pH levels can affect fish population survival.

simulationDelayMillis.description: The number of milliseconds to asynchronously wait before the next update event is sent.
